name: CRAFT BATTLE SIMULATOR
description: CRAFT BATTLE SIMULATOR is an awesome multiplayer game. You have to control a ship with the crew and cannons going around destroying other ships. This game is tons of fun to play with friends or even alone as you can single handedly dismantle a fleet if youâ€™re skilled enough.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1+ Ghz Intel/AMD Dual core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel hd 5500 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
